content: In 1992 I started my own business. Was I in for shock! After paying my quarterly’s, when I got the bill for what I actually owed, it was time to go deeper in debt. The way I’ve viewed it since, is my tax bill is my membership dues to the exclusive USA club. But I wonder today, if our president “who pays no taxes” would leave me alone if I took care of my taxes like he does. Leadership comes from the top; and I’m having a hard time justifying my support for lunacy. Our tax dollars= racism, nepotism, authoritarian, elitism, militarism, and a bunch more of ism’s I can’t think of right now. Quote by Trump, “ I’m smart, I don’t pay taxes.” Happy April 15.
